title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. F, pt. 126 - Licensed Private Career Schools Or Licensed Private Schools

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 212, 305, 5001-5010; L. 1972, ch. 817; L. 1986, chs. 680, 681; L. 1990, ch. 887; L. 1993, ch. 604; L. 2012, ch. 381; State Administrative Procedure Act, §

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
